summary: Project includes building a per-product tiered/package pricing feature with rules for handling quantities that don't match a tier.
architectural_notes: Tier/package pricing is configured per product (tiers are flexible; not fixed to example values).
Non-matching purchase quantities use pricing option B: all units are charged normal price except units that exactly match a defined tier.

existing_features.title: Add a tier/package pricing editor to the product create/edit dialog so users can add, remove, and edit multiple tiers (quantity + total price) per product.
Update the POS page cart calculations and line item displays to use tier/package pricing with Option B so the on-screen totals match backend totals.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add per-product tier/package pricing (multiple quantity-price tiers per product) with calculation rule: for non-matching quantities, charge normal price except quantities that exactly match a tier (option B).
Extend the backend Product model to support per-product tier/package pricing, where each product can optionally define multiple quantity-to-total-price tiers.
Update the backend product create/update API to accept and validate tier/package pricing data per product.

Implement cart line pricing using the user-selected rule (Option B): if the purchased quantity exactly matches a tier quantity, charge the tier total price; otherwise charge normal unit price for the entire quantity (no package splitting/combining).

projectName: Implement per-product tier/package pricing with option-B quantity calculation
